#include <cmath>
#include <cstdio>
#include <vector>
#include <iostream>
#include <algorithm>
#define gc getchar
#define ll long long
using namespace std;

void scanint(int &x)
{
    register int c = gc();
    x = 0;
    for(;(c<48 || c>57);c = gc());
    for(;c>47 && c<58;c = gc()) {x = (x<<1) + (x<<3) + c - 48;}
}

int main(){
    int t;
    scanint(t);
    while(t--){
    int n,i;
scanint(n);
int a[n];
int ans[n];
for(i=0;i<n;i++){
    scanint(a[i]);
}
sort(a,a+n);
ans[0]=a[0];
for(i=1;i<n;i++){
    if(i%2!=0){
            if(i<n-1) ans[i]=a[i+1];
        else ans[i]=a[i];
    }
    else ans[i]=a[i-1];
}
for(i=0;i<n;i++){
    printf("%d ",ans[i]);
}
printf("\n");
}
return 0;
}
